text: G L Roberts Collegiate and Vocational Institute is located in Oshawa, Ontario within the Durham District School Board. The school has students in grades 9-12 and offers a wide range of academic and extracurricular activities. Sports at GL include Basketball, Volleyball, Rugby, Badminton, and Track & Field. ==See also== *List of high schools in Ontario ==External links== *G L Roberts Collegiate and Vocational Institute Category:High schools in Oshawa Category:Educational institutions with year of establishment missing
title: G L Roberts Collegiate and Vocational Institute
